entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with drizzle ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 11:45 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. Rain beginning near noon. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:45 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:45 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
